hero.title: Full-Stack Developer
hero.intro: Driven to create refined, inclusive digital experiences that are both visually precise and user-centered.
paragraphs: I have gained valuable experience working on freelance projects, where each assignment allows me to blend creativity with technology to deliver intuitive and user-friendly solutions.

Currently, I also work as a data analyst, which lets me combine analytical thinking with my development skills. This background enables me to create projects that are not only visually appealing but also functional and user-centered.

modernWeb.title: Building modern web experiences powered by AI.
points: I specialize in crafting clean, scalable applications with React, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS, supported by Python on the backend.
My workflow is enhanced by AI tools that speed up coding, testing, and problem-solving, letting me focus on what matters most: building great user experiences.
Always learning, always experimenting, always creating.

CTA.tagline: Code smarter. Build faster. Stay creative.
CTA.title: Ideas are cool. Execution is better. Here’s mine.

project1.title: Smokin’s Loyalty App
project1.description: A simple and efficient loyalty program that allows users to earn and redeem points by scanning QR codes. The app includes separate roles for users and admins, ensuring seamless in-store management via smartphone only.

project2.title: Blanco Trade WebApp
project2.description: A modern B2B platform designed to simplify trading operations and data visualization for business partners. The app provides responsive dashboards, advanced analytics, and real-time updates for seamless collaboration.

project3.title: Design & 3D Visualization
project3.description: A creative collection of 3D product visualizations and web design projects. Each render highlights realistic materials, lighting, and precise modeling used in modern digital branding.
